author: cms-sw
body: In past workflow 101.0,102.0  were not ready to run in multi-threaded mode, so we were always running these in single thread mode. This PR changes this behavior and for cmssw 12.X and above it run these in multi-threaded mode.
title: run wf 101.0,102.0 in multithreading mode for cmssw 12 and above
